001/*

005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
009
010import java.util.Collection;
011import java.util.List;
012import java.util.function.Predicate;
013import java.util.stream.Collectors;
014import java.util.stream.Stream;
015
016import javax.xml.namespace.QName;
017
018import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
019import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
020
021/**
022 * The API for accessing information about a given Metaschema module.
023 * <p>
024 * A Metaschem module may import another Metaschema module. This import graph
025 * can be accessed using {@link #getImportedModules()}.
026 * <p>
027 * Global scoped Metaschema definitions can be accessed using
028 * {@link #getScopedAssemblyDefinitionByName(QName)},
029 * {@link #getScopedFieldDefinitionByName(QName)}, and
030 * {@link #getScopedFlagDefinitionByName(QName)}. These methods take into
031 * consideration the import order to provide the global definitions that are in
032 * scope within the given Metschema module.
033 * <p>
034 * Global scoped definitions exported by this Metaschema module, available for
035 * use by importing Metaschema modules, can be accessed using
036 * {@link #getExportedAssemblyDefinitions()},
037 * {@link #getExportedFieldDefinitions()}, and
038 * {@link #getExportedFlagDefinitions()}.
039 * <p>
040 * Global scoped definitions defined directly within the given Metaschema module
041 * can be accessed using {@link #getAssemblyDefinitions()},
042 * {@link #getFieldDefinitions()}, and {@link #getFlagDefinitions()}, along with
043 * similarly named access methods.
044 *
045 * @param <M>
046 *          the imported module Java type
047 * @param <D>
048 *          the model definition Java type
049 * @param <FL>
050 *          the flag definition Java type
051 * @param <FI>
052 *          the field definition Java type
053 * @param <A>
054 *          the assembly definition Java type
055 */
056public interface IModuleExtended<
057    M extends IModuleExtended<M, D, FL, FI, A>,
058    D extends IModelDefinition,
059    FL extends IFlagDefinition,
060    FI extends IFieldDefinition,
061    A extends IAssemblyDefinition> extends IModule {
062
063  /**
064   * Get a filter that will match all definitions that are not locally defined.
065   *
066   * @param <DEF>
067   *          the type of definition
068   * @return a predicate implementing the filter
069   */
070  static <DEF extends IDefinition> Predicate<DEF> allNonLocalDefinitions() {
071    return definition -> {
072      return ModuleScopeEnum.INHERITED.equals(definition.getModuleScope())
073          || ModelType.ASSEMBLY.equals(definition.getModelType()) && ((IAssemblyDefinition) definition).isRoot();
074    };
075  }
076
077  /**
078   * Get a filter that will match all definitions that are root assemblies.
079   *
080   * @param <DEF>
081   *          the type of definition
082   * @return a predicate implementing the filter
083   */
084  static <DEF extends IDefinition> Predicate<DEF> allRootAssemblyDefinitions() {
085    return definition -> {
086      return ModelType.ASSEMBLY.equals(definition.getModelType()) && ((IAssemblyDefinition) definition).isRoot();
087    };
088  }
089
090  @Override
091  @NonNull
092  List<? extends M> getImportedModules();
093
094  @Override
095  @Nullable
096  M getImportedModuleByShortName(String name);
097
098  @Override
099  @NonNull
100  Collection<FL> getFlagDefinitions();
101
102  @Override
103  @Nullable
104  FL getFlagDefinitionByName(@NonNull QName name);
105
106  @Override
107  @NonNull
108  Collection<A> getAssemblyDefinitions();
109
110  @Override
111  @Nullable
112  A getAssemblyDefinitionByName(@NonNull QName name);
113
114  @Override
115  @NonNull
116  Collection<FI> getFieldDefinitions();
117
118  @Override
119  @Nullable
120  FI getFieldDefinitionByName(@NonNull QName name);
121
122  @Override
123  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
124  @NonNull
125  default List<D> getAssemblyAndFieldDefinitions() {
126    return ObjectUtils.notNull(
127        Stream.concat(
128            (Stream<D>) getAssemblyDefinitions().stream(),
129            (Stream<D>) getFieldDefinitions().stream())
130            .collect(Collectors.toList()));
131  }
132
133  @Override
134  @Nullable
135  default A getScopedAssemblyDefinitionByName(@NonNull QName name) {
136    // first try local/global top-level definitions from current metaschema module
137    A retval = getAssemblyDefinitionByName(name);
138    if (retval == null) {
139      // try global definitions from imported Metaschema modules
140      retval = getExportedAssemblyDefinitionByName(name);
141    }
142    return retval;
143  }
144
145  @Override
146  @Nullable
147  default FI getScopedFieldDefinitionByName(@NonNull QName name) {
148    // first try local/global top-level definitions from current metaschema module
149    FI retval = getFieldDefinitionByName(name);
150    if (retval == null) {
151      // try global definitions from imported metaschema modules
152      retval = getExportedFieldDefinitionByName(name);
153    }
154    return retval;
155  }
156
157  @Override
158  @Nullable
159  default FL getScopedFlagDefinitionByName(@NonNull QName name) {
160    // first try local/global top-level definitions from current metaschema module
161    FL retval = getFlagDefinitionByName(name);
162    if (retval == null) {
163      // try global definitions from imported metaschema modules
164      retval = getExportedFlagDefinitionByName(name);
165    }
166    return retval;
167  }
168
169  @Override
170  @NonNull
171  default Collection<? extends A> getExportedRootAssemblyDefinitions() {
172    return ObjectUtils.notNull(getExportedAssemblyDefinitions().stream()
173        .filter(allRootAssemblyDefinitions())
174        .collect(Collectors.toList()));
175  }
176
177  @Override
178  @NonNull
179  default Collection<? extends A> getRootAssemblyDefinitions() {
180    return ObjectUtils.notNull(getAssemblyDefinitions().stream()
181        .filter(allRootAssemblyDefinitions())
182        .collect(Collectors.toList()));
183  }
184
185  @Override
186  @NonNull
187  Collection<? extends FL> getExportedFlagDefinitions();
188
189  @Override
190  @Nullable
191  FL getExportedFlagDefinitionByName(QName name);
192
193  @Override
194  @NonNull
195  Collection<? extends FI> getExportedFieldDefinitions();
196
197  @Override
198  @Nullable
199  FI getExportedFieldDefinitionByName(QName name);
200
201  @Override
202  @NonNull
203  Collection<? extends A> getExportedAssemblyDefinitions();
204
205  @Override
206  @Nullable
207  A getExportedAssemblyDefinitionByName(QName name);
208}
